title: authentication api login registration and 2fa
description: Test the authentication API endpoints for user login, registration, and two-factor authentication to ensure secure and error-free user access.

title: games management api game provider and category handling
description: Verify the games management API for correct handling of games, providers, and categories including listing, filtering, and management operations.

title: wallet transactions api deposits withdrawals and balance updates
description: Test wallet transactions API for deposit, withdrawal, and real-time balance update functionalities ensuring accounting integrity and no duplication.

title: affiliate system api commission tracking and withdrawal
description: Validate the affiliate system API for accurate commission calculation, tracking, and withdrawal processing with detailed reporting.

title: bonus promotions api mission and daily bonus management
description: Test the bonus promotions API for managing missions, daily bonuses, and promotions ensuring correct bonus application and tracking.

title: payment gateway api pix stripe and aureolink integration
description: Verify payment gateway API integration with PIX, Stripe, and AureoLink including transaction processing and webhook event handling.

title: playfivers integration api dual agent fallback and token rotation
description: Test PlayFivers integration API for dual-agent system functionality including API token rotation, failover, and fallback on service failure or insufficient balance.

title: admin dashboard api real time metrics and management
description: Validate admin dashboard API for displaying accurate real-time metrics, user and game management reflecting the current database state.

title: user profile api preference and like management
description: Test user profile API for managing user preferences and likes ensuring data consistency and correct update operations.

title: settings configuration api system wide parameters management
description: Verify settings configuration API for managing system-wide settings including currency, banners, and other configuration parameters.
